text: Brian Gill is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s. He played at club level for Castleford (Heritage №).David Smart & Andrew Howard (1 July 2000) "Images of Sport - Castleford Rugby League - A Twentieth Century History". title: Brian Gill
